name: Alexander Kunyo's Historical Period Drama: The End of the Samurai
name_original: Alexander Kunyo's Historical Period Drama: The End of the Samurai
description:
Delta City High School is putting on a play about the final battle of the samurai, with dodgeball team captain Alex Kunyo playing the lead role! After his character’s dramatic death in the final act, though, it’s up to his right hand man Mamarou to take the spotlight! Suffering from a mild case of stage fright, Mamarou only manages to focus by imagining himself as an actual Meiji era samurai warrior! 

This is an extremely short one. Like, five minutes of playtime maximum. Full disclosure, this project is actually a slight edit of a game I created for a Japanese history class. I figured with a slightly different context, some sprite changes, and a Kunio-Kun reference it wouldn’t stick out too much from everything else I post, so here it is. Despite it being very short and very basic, I still hope you enjoy it! And thank you as always for playing!
